page.title: 08SHOPPING IN POTTERS GREEN
page.content:
People in Potters Green can shop locally in small shops ,travel into Coventry (or to other towns) to larger shops ,or go to supermarkets like Asda or Tesco.They travel there by bus or car.We asked some people where they shopped and what they got bought: {LOCALLY}vegetables bread groceries alcoholic drink {IN TOWN}furniture cheap fruit footwear stationary clothes {SUPERMARKETS} meat sweets main shopping things for the bathroom
We asked how much was spent on food in a week and were told it ,was between Â£30 and Â£40 for basic shopping with no luxuries.
